metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Fuck The Police has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Chord Complexity and Chord-Melody Tension and below-average scores in Melodic Complexity, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion:
Fuck The Police is written in the key of C Major.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the most common key in all of popular music. 

See the C Major Cheat Sheet for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
